cmd.help-command: Prints help for a specific command
cmd.cat: Displays the contents of a file or shows a download link
cmd.echo: Prints provided string to the terminal
cmd.top: Scrolls to the top of the terminal window
cmd.viu: Displays an image in the terminal
cmd.viu-flags-width: Sets the width of the image
cmd.viu-flags-height: Sets the height of the image
